ygData.subject: Re: list and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I was wondering what to fight when level 15?  I have been hunting Young Kodies, and weak Kodies in west commons but find the respawn rate bad. I have
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I was wondering what to fight when level 15? I have been hunting
Young Kodies, and weak Kodies in west commons but find the respawn rate bad.
I have been trying to stick to blue things, but do look at attacking even
Kodies, but have a huge down time for doing that. I stay away from yellows
if pet doesn't become "milk bone" for the bear (then I run). I have been
hunting alone, group hasn't been on as much, maybe need to find another
group now. I tried to kill Derv thugs in west commons but their are 2 spell
casters grouped and stealing every kill from me, so it is not an option
(they have done it to me about 4 times so far) unless I use harm touch and
pet I bet I could out damage them.

I found killing Young Kodies + giant spiders alone pushed me through level
14 slowly plus made about 25 plat for the entire level (then spent 14plat
for the level 15 spells), oh group did log in and we hunted in fire storm
for a few hours and I got a bubble and a half + about 4 plat. Note: pick up
balstic eggs worth just over 8 gold each (someone left the body I picked up
the eggs to sell, why not easy money and saw the price).

As for HH, I attacked some named orc just out side of hh pass, loc -500
4300, somewhere around their just watch out for the village, and someone
told me that he was like killing 10 orcs in high hold pass, for just killing
him. He coned blue to me, but I was just exploring and didn't have pet out,
used HT and it didn't drop him (I figure he has about 300hp, as I did 303hp
to him total), but he died none the less and me with 2 bubbles left. I was
told watch out for his friend that spawns with him on occasion. Oh, and he
bashes, which I really don't like. Plus what are you suppose to do with the
orc scalp?

Anyway anyone know where to hunt alone when you are level 15, no magic
weapon yet, and not a whole lot of banded armor yet. Or just stick to west
commons. Don't like mummy's because of the rabies thing.

David


----- Original Message -----
From: Chris <roysca@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 9:38 AM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] list and stuff


From: "Chris" <roysca@...>

That was a really good response Beld. I currently play an ogre shadowknight
lvl 22 on Povar. I haven't really tried the fear and then chase to get a
few hits in, but I definitly like the sound of it. I normally hit with a
darkness spell, then a str sapping spell and melee away. My warrior side is
much better than my spell casting side, so I play the tank mostly. I always
try to group with a cleric if possible. Also, I TOTALLY agree with having
your pet, I even try to get one when in a group. This morning I was
fighting in Highpass Hold (MY GOD, how many do I have to kill before I can
go into HH :) ) and they drop a lot of the rusty weapons. I gave my pet a
rusty mace and he was hitting in the range of 15-18. Very nice little
addition.

I have almost full bronze on finally, with a few exceptions. I have a
grotesque mask, and I finally got a greater zweihander (sp), which reminds
me, i'm selling a 2handed well balanced, magical axe on that server which
normally sells for about 550 from the shady guy in the ecommons/nro tunnel.
I'm selling it for around 300 if anyone is interested. I am also curious as
to what type of armour/items other ogre sk's are wearing and any suggestoins
they might have.

Chris/Barto.

<Snip>
